entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Mid Rise Leggings - Taffy
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 60.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Mid-Rise Fit
● 4-inch Waistband
● Squat Proof/No-Show
● Full-Length
● + ZinTex Technology

ZinTex’s Mid Rise Leggings are full coverage and squat-proof, perfect for heading to yoga or lifting heavyweights. Designed with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex technology. The fabric blend maintains a buttery soft, cool-to-the-touch, near-weightless finish on the skin. Find heat-sealed reflective logos and “Make the Most of Every Minute” on the back of the waistband. Complete the look with a matching top and hoodie.

Materials: 79% Polyester, 21% Spandex

Model Height: 5'7" Size: Small

entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Long Sleeve Crop Sports Top - Taffy
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 36.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Ultra Crop Top
● Light Support
● Raglan Long Sleeves
● Crew Neck
● Athletic Mesh Back Panel
● Heat-sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

Look and feel your best in the gym wearing ZinTex’s Long Sleeve Crop Sports Top. Made for active performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex fabric technology. The raglan sleeve cut gives you additional mobility as you work out and the fabric is cool-to-the-touch. You’ll find a vertical athletic mesh back panel and heat-sealed reflective logo design. Pair with your favorite bottoms or be “that girl” with the complete color-coordinated set.

Materials: 79% Polyester, 21% Spandex

Model Height: 5'7" Size: Small

entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Cropped Workout Hoodie - Taffy
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 52.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Ultra Crop Length
● Vintage Wash
● Snap Button Hood
● Fitted Waistband & Cuffs
● Heat-Sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

A warm-up essential: the ZinTex Cropped Workout Hoodie is cut above the waist to contour your shape. Featuring UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex fabric technology. Perfect for a chilly morning run, this sweatshirt comes in a cozy vintage wash with heavy-duty snap buttons on the hood. Find heat-sealed reflective logos and “Make the Most of Every Minute” on the hood. Available in a complete 3-piece matching set.

Materials:
Body: 100% Cotton
Cuff: 93% Cotton, 7% Spandex

Model Height: 5'7" Size: Small

entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Slim Fit Joggers - Midnight
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 60.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Classic Tapered Fit
● Drawstring Waistband
● Side Zipper Pocket
● Towel Strap
● Heat-Sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

The ZinTex Joggers are a classic staple to every workout wardrobe. Made for performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to ZinTex fabric technology. The adjustable drawstring waistband moves with you as you exercise. Clip your keys, AirPods, or a towel onto your waistband strap for easy access. Designed with heat-sealed reflective logos, four (4) open pockets and one (1) side zipper pocket.

Materials:
Body: 49% Polyester, 46% Cotton, 5% Spandex
Pocket: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

﻿﻿Model Height: 5'11" Size: Medium

● Regular Fit
● Crew Neck
● Raglan Sleeve Cut

● Athletic Mesh Back Panel
● Heat-Sealed Reflective Logos

Everything you need for an unmatched workout in one shirt- the ZinTex Long Sleeve Sports Tee. A cool-to-the-touch classic crew with raglan sleeves made for maximum mobility and comfort as you move. Find an athletic mesh back panel and heat-sealed reflective logos throughout.
